selection_reasoning: Generation 9 confirmed that the 1.000016 plateau is extremely difficult to exceed. The symmetry-based and micro-polishing approaches in Gen 9 didn't immediately yield better results, likely due to implementation details or the fact that the 'best' configuration is already nearly perfect. We will carry forward the best historical trials and the most interesting Gen 9 concepts to attempt a more precise 'surgical' refinement in Generation 10.

trial_selections.reasoning: Current best performing implementation (1.0000159135539164) using slack variables and SLSQP.
Identical top score, uses a different multi-start strategy that is very robust.
Best of Gen 9. Although it didn't beat the all-time best, its approach to micro-refinement is worth combining with the trial_7_5 starting point.
